title: 2020: Bill de Blasio on taxing the rich and rooting for the Red Sox
description: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio joins Jon L. to talk about staying in the race, running a city, achieving universal pre-K, beefing with Cuomo, and why he's still a Red Sox fan.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
content:encoded: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio joins Jon L. to talk about staying in the race, running a city, achieving universal pre-K, beefing with Cuomo, and why he's still a Red Sox fan.
